isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AIR-TO-AIR CHARGE AIR COOLER - MAINTENANCE - AIR CLEANER AND AIR FILTERS

svcproc.title: AIR CLEANER AND AIR FILTERS
svcproc.para: Assure the air cleaner is properly maintained and can deliver sufficient filtered air to the engine:

step1.para: Be sure the air cleaner housing is air-tight, and securely assembled to the air intake pipe. Clean or replace air cleaner elements and components as required. Repair or replace a damaged air cleaner or elements immediately.
Use the recommended air filter service element to replace the dirty element.
